useCase.name: Data Transfer
useCase.description: Moving specific data utilizing the data/move method in the Common Data Service (CDS).

preconditions.precondition: Data Steward has access to the Common Data Service.

successEndConditions.condition: The specified data is successfully moved.

useCase.trigger: Data Steward instructs the data transfer operation.

mainSequence.step: Data Steward needs to move specific data using the data/move method
Data Steward interacts with CDS to initiate data transfer
CDS moves the specified data as per the provided instructions
